title: Liverpool reject Southampton's loan swoop for unwanted defender Mamadou Sakho
text:

Liverpool have rejected Southampton's attempt to sign defender Mamadou Sakho on loan. 
Saints were keen on signing the Frenchman until the end of the season but the Reds are only interested in letting him leave permanently. 
The 26-year-old is firmly out of favour with Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp and last turned out for the Anfield outfit nine months ago in a 4-0 derby win over Everton. 
Sakho will be allowed to leave this month if a suitable offer is received, but Liverpool are determined to get a fee close to Â£20m, the Liverpool Echo report. Read More
